top_comments.comment: I'm from the south and I know not to get between a mamma bear and her cubs! Evidently some city democrats have never been taught this! Mamma bear 101 is in session America! Let's go Brandon!!!

comments_since_last_sample.body: It makes no difference what the law of not teaching CRT.  These teachers are going to teach what they wants. The only way to stop it is to put cameras with audio in each classroom to monitor what each teacher teaches.
